scenarios.name: Simple Greeting - Easy
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Hallo, wie geht es dir heute?"
scenarios.expected_output: Hello, how are you today?

scenarios.name: Restaurant Order - Easy
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Ich hätte gerne einen Kaffee und ein Stück Kuchen, bitte."
scenarios.expected_output: I would like to order a coffee and a piece of cake, please.

scenarios.name: Weather Description - Medium
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Die Wettervorhersage sagt starken Regen und Gewitter für das ganze Wochenende voraus, daher sollten wir unsere Wanderung wahrscheinlich verschieben."
scenarios.expected_output: The weather forecast predicts heavy rainfall and thunderstorms throughout the weekend, so we should probably postpone our hiking trip.

scenarios.name: Technology Discussion - Medium
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Das neueste Smartphone verfügt über ein fortschrittliches Kamerasystem mit künstlicher Intelligenz, das automatisch die Bildqualität bei verschiedenen Lichtverhältnissen verbessern kann."
scenarios.expected_output: The latest smartphone features an advanced camera system with artificial intelligence capabilities that can automatically enhance photo quality in various lighting conditions.

scenarios.name: Academic Text - Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Der interdisziplinäre Ansatz zur nachhaltigen Entwicklung erfordert eine Zusammenarbeit zwischen Umweltwissenschaftlern, Ökonomen und Politikern, um die komplexen Herausforderungen des Klimawandels anzugehen und gleichzeitig das Wirtschaftswachstum aufrechtzuerhalten."
scenarios.expected_output: The interdisciplinary approach to sustainable development requires collaboration between environmental scientists, economists, and policy makers to address the complex challenges of climate change while maintaining economic growth.

scenarios.name: Idiomatic Expression - Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Man soll den Tag nicht vor dem Abend loben - wir sollten auf die offiziellen Ergebnisse warten, bevor wir unseren Erfolg feiern."
scenarios.expected_output: Don't count your chickens before they hatch - we should wait for the official results before celebrating our success.

scenarios.name: Medical Context - Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Der Patient zeigt Symptome einer akuten Bronchitis, einschließlich anhaltendem Husten, Brustenge und Atembeschwerden, was eine sofortige medizinische Behandlung erfordern könnte."
scenarios.expected_output: The patient exhibits symptoms of acute bronchitis, including persistent cough, chest tightness, and difficulty breathing, which may require immediate medical intervention.

scenarios.name: Short Question - Easy

Target language: English

scenarios.expected_output: Where is the nearest train station?

scenarios.name: Literary Text - Very Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Der melancholische Herbstwind flüsterte durch die goldenen Blätter und trug die bittersüßen Erinnerungen an die flüchtige Umarmung des Sommers mit sich, als ob die Natur selbst den unvermeidlichen Lauf der Zeit betrauerte."
scenarios.expected_output: The melancholic autumn wind whispered through the golden leaves, carrying with it the bittersweet memories of summer's fleeting embrace, as if nature itself mourned the inevitable passage of time.

scenarios.name: Business Context - Medium

Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Unser Quartalsumsatzbericht zeigt eine erhebliche Umsatzsteigerung, die hauptsächlich durch starke Leistungen in den europäischen Märkten und erfolgreiche Produkteinführungen vorangetrieben wurde."
scenarios.expected_output: Our quarterly sales report indicates a significant increase in revenue, primarily driven by strong performance in the European markets and successful product launches.

scenarios.name: Travel Directions - Easy

Target language: English
Text to translate: "Nehmen Sie die zweite Straße rechts und gehen Sie etwa 200 Meter geradeaus weiter."
scenarios.expected_output: Take the second street on the right and continue straight for about 200 meters.

scenarios.name: Emergency Situation - Medium
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Bitte rufen Sie sofort einen Krankenwagen! Es gab einen schweren Unfall und jemand braucht dringend medizinische Hilfe."
scenarios.expected_output: Please call an ambulance immediately! There has been a serious accident and someone needs urgent medical attention.

scenarios.name: Scientific Research - Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Die Hypothese postuliert, dass Quantenverschränkungsphänomene möglicherweise die Informationsverarbeitungskapazitäten in Computerarchitekturen der nächsten Generation revolutionieren könnten."
scenarios.expected_output: The hypothesis postulates that quantum entanglement phenomena could potentially revolutionize information processing capabilities in next-generation computing architectures.

scenarios.name: Cooking Instructions - Medium

scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Heizen Sie den Ofen auf 180 Grad Celsius vor, vermischen Sie die Zutaten gründlich und backen Sie etwa 25 Minuten, bis alles goldbraun ist."
scenarios.expected_output: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius, mix the ingredients thoroughly, and bake for approximately 25 minutes until golden brown.

scenarios.name: Legal Document - Very Hard

Source language: German
Target language: English

scenarios.expected_output: The contracting parties hereby agree to the terms and conditions stipulated herein, whereby any breach of contract shall result in immediate termination and potential legal ramifications.

scenarios.name: Sports Commentary - Medium

scenarios.expected_output: The goalkeeper made an incredible save in the final seconds, securing the victory for his team in this thrilling championship match.

scenarios.name: Simple Apology - Easy

scenarios.name: Historical Text - Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Die Industrielle Revolution veränderte die Gesellschaft grundlegend und leitete eine Ära beispielloser technologischer Fortschritte und sozialer Veränderungen ein, die unsere moderne Welt weiterhin prägt."
scenarios.expected_output: The Industrial Revolution fundamentally transformed society, ushering in an era of unprecedented technological advancement and social change that continues to influence our modern world.

scenarios.name: Philosophical Quote - Very Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Das ungeprüfte Leben ist nicht lebenswert, denn durch Selbstreflexion und Kontemplation entdecken wir unseren wahren Zweck und Sinn im Dasein."
scenarios.expected_output: The unexamined life is not worth living, for it is through self-reflection and contemplation that we discover our true purpose and meaning in existence.

scenarios.name: Environmental News - Medium
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Erneuerbare Energiequellen wie Solar- und Windkraft werden in vielen Regionen weltweit zu immer kostengünstigeren Alternativen zu herkömmlichen fossilen Brennstoffen."
scenarios.expected_output: Renewable energy sources such as solar and wind power are becoming increasingly cost-effective alternatives to traditional fossil fuels in many regions worldwide.

scenarios.name: German Idiom - Das ist nicht das Gelbe vom Ei - Very Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Die neue Lösung ist nicht das Gelbe vom Ei, aber sie ist besser als das, was wir vorher hatten."
scenarios.expected_output: The new solution isn't perfect (or isn't the best), but it's better than what we had before.

scenarios.name: German Idiom - Jemandem einen Bären aufbinden - Very Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Du willst mir doch wohl keinen Bären aufbinden! Das kann ich kaum glauben."
scenarios.expected_output: You're not trying to pull my leg, are you! I can hardly believe that.

scenarios.name: German Wordplay - Verschlimmbessern - Very Hard

scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Mit seinem Eingriff hat er die Situation nur verschlimmbessert."
scenarios.expected_output: With his intervention, he only made things worse while trying to improve them.

scenarios.name: German Slang - Das ist mir Wurst - Very Hard
scenarios.personality: You are a professional translator. Translate the given text from the source language to the target language. Provide only the translated text without any additional explanation or formatting.
scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Welches Restaurant wir wählen, ist mir völlig Wurst. Hauptsache, das Essen schmeckt."
scenarios.expected_output: Which restaurant we choose is completely irrelevant to me. As long as the food tastes good.

scenarios.name: German Cultural Reference - Ostalgie - Very Hard

Source language: German

scenarios.expected_output: His nostalgia for East Germany shows in his collection of GDR memorabilia and his romanticizing of the 'good old days'.

scenarios.name: German Idiom - Tomaten auf den Augen haben - Very Hard

scenarios.expected_output: Are you blind? The key is right there in front of you on the table!

scenarios.name: German Compound Word - Verschlimmbesserer - Very Hard

scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Er ist ein klassischer Verschlimmbesserer - jedes Mal, wenn er helfen will, macht er alles nur noch schlimmer."
scenarios.expected_output: He's a classic person who makes things worse while trying to improve them - every time he wants to help, he just makes everything worse.

scenarios.name: German Idiom - Ins Gras beißen - Very Hard

scenarios.name: German Idiom - Auf dem Holzweg sein - Very Hard

scenarios.test_prompt:
Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Wenn du denkst, dass diese Strategie funktioniert, bist du auf dem Holzweg."
scenarios.expected_output: If you think this strategy will work, you're barking up the wrong tree.

scenarios.name: German Complex Compound - Verschlimmbessrerungssucht - Very Hard

Source language: German
Target language: English
Text to translate: "Seine Verschlimmbessrerungssucht macht ihn zu einem schwierigen Teamkollegen."
scenarios.expected_output: His compulsion to make things worse while trying to improve them makes him a difficult teammate.

scenarios.name: German Idiom - Schwein haben - Very Hard

Source language: German
Target language: English

scenarios.expected_output: You were really lucky! Without the umbrella you would have gotten soaking wet.

scenarios.name: German Ironic Expression - Das ist ja toll - Very Hard

Source language: German

scenarios.expected_output: My car is broken, it's raining and I lost my key. That's just great!

scenarios.name: German Idiom - Kalte Füße bekommen - Very Hard

scenarios.expected_output: Shortly before the presentation, he got cold feet and canceled the appointment.
